title: What am I facing, as far as contamination, when a needle from a vaccination touched a table and then was injected?
description: Answer (1 of 12): Anything. But good news it's pretty low risk that the needle picks up anything and the viral load or infection load would be extremely low. That said there always is a possibility that one does get infected. It then depends on how strong your body defences are. Once it's happene...
